name: RECONO.ME
slogan: Optimising the after-life of gadgets and hardware
description: We run a comprehensive b2b E-waste collection service that's completely free. Much of what we receive is in working condition. Instead of sending everything to a recycling centre, we divert material, components, and devices into higher-value streams, keeping them in the economy for longer. Win-win!

team.name: Nick Rawkins
team.bioHtml: Bond trader for 8yrs @Citigroup Global Markets . Now founder of E-waste start-up @RECONO.ME .

jobs.title: SEO expert - Part-time
jobs.description:
We're looking for a seasoned digital marketer to advise on and implement a SEO strategy that leads to increased web inquiries. 

We are looking to target specific geographies and household income brackets for our E-waste collections. This role is part of the bigger strategy we require for gearing up towards scale-up. 

We are looking for someone to work directly along-side Nick Rawkins, the founder.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We're looking for a seasoned digital marketer to advise on and implement a SEO strategy that leads to increased web inquiries.

We are looking to target specific geographies and household income brackets for our E-waste collections. This role is part of the bigger strategy we require for gearing up towards scale-up.

We are looking for someone to work directly along-side Nick Rawkins, the founder.
skills: A Proven Track Record of Tasks & Project Completion

jobs.title: E-Commerce Manager - Sustainable Electronics @ RECONO.ME
jobs.description:
At RECONO.ME we’re working hard to change our relationship with electronics. E-waste is the fastest growing waste stream and only 20% of it currently gets recycled.

Businesses constantly need to get rid of IT hardware. And all of us have gadgets sitting around gathering dust in "that drawer". RECONO.ME mobilises these devices by providing an end-to-end recycling solution that safely and responsibly collects these gadgets and prepares them for the next owner. 

Our process covers everything to do with these unwanted electronics, from secure data deletion to sustainable recycling - you name it. Our main goal is to double or even triple the useful life of valuable technology by refurbishing and upgrading it. We want to become the go-to for quality, refurbished products.

Our focus is on refurbishing and reselling high-end consumer electronics (tablets and laptops) and IT equipment (PCs, servers, networking equipment).

RECONO.ME sells mainly through 2 channels :
1) Direct sales to businesses 
2) E-commerce to small businesses and consumers

We're looking for a seasoned E-Commerce expert to help us systematically build our market share and penetration.

Your responsibilities include:
- Apply sound science and data mining to strategically acquire customers and pursue new segments 
- Manage E-commerce execution, work closely with founder on strategy
- Product listings optimisation
- Build, execute, and manage data-driven paid ads strategy across the platforms, monitor metrics and performance
- Analyse and implement effective KPI feedback system, spot areas for improvement in marketing and execute on process improvement
- Work closely with UX designers, developers, and warehouse team

jobs.title: Hardware Start-Up Master Technician (Level 3 or above)
jobs.description:
RECONO.ME is a fast-growing start-up is working hard to end E-waste. Every year tons of valuable gadgets are needlessly thrown away. Through our process, we're revolutionising the system for handing E-waste. (https://recono.me)

RECONO.ME's focus is on refurbishing and reselling high-end consumer electronics (tablets and laptops) and IT equipment (PCs, servers, networking equipment) that we collect from businesses.

RECONO.ME is looking for a gifted Level 3 Technician with a strong business mind who is interested in joining our start-up.

We'll need you to be able to perform :

- PCB repairs

- Networking set-up

- Advanced diagnostics/repairs on Laptops and Computers, Mobile Phones, and Tablets

- Component-level repair including micro-soldering on motherboard/GPU

- Liquid damage repair

- Repairing connectors (USB, HDMI, etc.)

- Data erasure from computers, servers, mobile phones, printers etc.

This candidate should also have experience leading a team of technicians and running a repair operation. A solid knowledge of various hardware categories will be a great asset.

Additionally, you'll be responsible for running the day-to-day operations of the warehouse. Keeping inventory, ordering replacement components, and discussing hardware/software issues with customers (our focus is on working with corporate IT managers).

We are a small team and you will work side-by-side Nick Rawkins, the founder. It's a fun and relaxed environment, but we expect a strong work-ethic, attention to detail, and a willingness to contribute ideas to grow the business.

We recognise the positive value of diversity, we want to promote equality and challenge discrimination. We welcome and encourage applications from people of all backgrounds.
